FuncDef:
The user accounting-together enable command counts DAA service traffic into user traffic.
The undo user accounting-together enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, DAA service traffic is not counted into user traffic.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the traffic-seperate enable command is run, service traffic is separated from user traffic. To facilitate network management, you can run the user accounting-together enable command to count DAA service traffic into user traffic.
Prerequisites
A DAA service policy template has been configured using value-added-service policy  daa command.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command applies to a device on which the traffic-seperate enable command is run.
